axe_slash_arc.name: Wider Arc
axe_slash_arc.description: Increases the area of effect of AxeSlash.

axe_slash_stun.name: Stunning Blow
axe_slash_stun.description: Adds a chance to stun enemies hit by AxeSlash.

magic_bolt_efficiency.name: Mana Efficiency
magic_bolt_efficiency.description: Reduces the mana cost of MagicBolt by 15%.

magic_bolt_elemental_fire.name: Fire Attunement
magic_bolt_elemental_fire.description: MagicBolt now deals additional Fire damage.

magic_bolt_penetration.name: Piercing Bolt
magic_bolt_penetration.description: MagicBolt can now pierce through one additional target.

magic_bolt_enhanced_fire.name: Intensified Flames
magic_bolt_enhanced_fire.description: Increases the Fire damage of MagicBolt.

holy_light_potency_1.name: Enhanced Healing I
holy_light_potency_1.description: Increases the amount healed by Holy Light by 15%.

holy_light_aoe.name: Healing Aura
holy_light_aoe.description: Holy Light now heals allies in a small area around the target.

holy_light_potency_2.name: Enhanced Healing II
holy_light_potency_2.description: Further increases the amount healed by Holy Light by 20%.

holy_light_protection.name: Protective Ward
holy_light_protection.description: Allies healed by Holy Light gain a temporary defensive buff.

holy_light_large_aoe.name: Expansive Aura
holy_light_large_aoe.description: Significantly increases the area of the Healing Aura.

holy_light_potency_3.name: Divine Intervention
holy_light_potency_3.description: Massively increases the healing potency of Holy Light by 30%.

turret_duration_1.name: Extended Deployment I
turret_duration_1.description: Increases the duration turrets stay active by 20%.

turret_count_2.name: Additional Unit
turret_count_2.description: Allows deployment of a second turret simultaneously.

turret_status_poison.name: Poison Rounds
turret_status_poison.description: Turret attacks now have a chance to apply poison.

turret_fire_rate_2.name: Rapid Fire II
turret_fire_rate_2.description: Further increases turret fire rate by 20%.

turret_count_3.name: Reinforced Deployment
turret_count_3.description: Allows deployment of a third turret simultaneously.

sniping_crit_chance_1.name: Keen Eye I
sniping_crit_chance_1.description: Increases Sniping critical hit chance by 5%.

sniping_crit_damage.name: Vital Point Targeting
sniping_crit_damage.description: Increases Sniping critical hit damage multiplier by 25%.

sniping_armor_pierce.name: Armor Piercing Rounds
sniping_armor_pierce.description: Sniping shots ignore 20% of enemy armor.

sniping_guided.name: Guided Shot
sniping_guided.description: Sniping shots slightly curve towards the target.

sniping_enhanced_pierce.name: Enhanced Armor Piercing
sniping_enhanced_pierce.description: Sniping shots now ignore 40% of enemy armor.

sniping_crit_chance_2.name: Keen Eye II
sniping_crit_chance_2.description: Further increases Sniping critical hit chance by 10%.

spirit_duration_1.name: Lingering Essence I
spirit_duration_1.description: Increases the duration summoned spirits remain active by 20%.

spirit_health_1.name: Resilient Spirits I
spirit_health_1.description: Increases the health of summoned spirits by 15%.

spirit_count_2.name: Twin Souls
spirit_count_2.description: Allows summoning a second spirit simultaneously.

spirit_strength_1.name: Empowered Spirits I
spirit_strength_1.description: Increases the damage dealt by summoned spirits by 20%.

spirit_strength_2.name: Empowered Spirits II
spirit_strength_2.description: Further increases the damage dealt by summoned spirits by 25%.

spirit_duration_2.name: Lingering Essence II
spirit_duration_2.description: Further increases the duration summoned spirits remain active by 30%.

spirit_count_3.name: Spirit Horde
spirit_count_3.description: Allows summoning a third spirit simultaneously.
